nodes.text: Nudjs were a type of green-skinned lizard found in the swamps of the planet Dagobah. In 3 ABY, a nudj scurried out of the entrance to the Cave of Evil as the Jedi in training Luke Skywalker entered.

A nudj first appeared in the 1980 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. They were first identified in the current canon in the video "Every Creature in the Star Wars Movies", which was released by the Star Wars Kids Youtube channel in 2019.
